<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Shielding Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=1041)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 143 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

As you attack a foe, warding magic transforms your momentum into action and lifts your shield. Make a melee Strike. You can then either [Raise your Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) if you're wielding one or cast [_shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) if you have the spell.
name: Shielding Strike
